summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Spruce Street from Twenty-first Avenue to Twenty-third Avenue in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and grading under Ordinance No. 14966, creating Local Improvement District No. 1320 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
